infos.value: The Arena is a place where you can battle others who have gathered in the Farplane.
Your rank is determined based on the outcome of your battles, and it resets weekly.
Because there is little competition on the first day after the reset, it may be best to start battling on Monday if you wish to attain a high rank.
You will receive items called Arena Medals based on your rank in the Arena.
You can also receive rewards for your participation that are unrelated to your performance in battle.
In addition to receiving rewards, you are likely to learn new strategies by battling against other players.
I recommend participating every day.
• Arena •
This is a <color=#00ffff>competitive mode</color> with other players. Your three units <color=#00ffff>automatically</color> face off against another player's three units.
• Arena II •
One <color=#00ffff>Arena Orb</color> is consumed upon entering a battle. If you run out of orbs, you can use <color=#00ffff>Visiore</color> to restore them.
• Ranking •
You are awarded <color=#00ffff>points</color> based on the outcome of your battles, and you will be <color=#00ffff>ranked</color> based on how many points you have accrued.
• Ranking II •

<color=#00ffff>Ranking</color> is determined <color=#00ffff>weekly</color>. It is based on a collective assessment of your battle performance from Monday at 12:00 a.m. (PST) to the following Sunday at 11:59 p.m. (PST).
• Ranking III •
In addition to receiving <color=#00ffff>rewards</color> based on your <color=#00ffff>finalized rank</color> on the <color=#00ffff>last day</color>...
• Ranking IV •
...<color=#00ffff>every day</color>, starting from Monday, you will be given <color=#00ffff>rewards</color> based on your <color=#00ffff>current rank</color>.
• Arena Medals •
<color=#00ffff>Arena Medals</color> can be <color=#00ffff>exchanged</color> for rare <color=#00ffff>items</color> at the Arena Medal Exchange Shop.
• Participation Rewards •
<color=#00ffff>Every day</color>, you will receive <color=#00ffff>rewards</color> each time you battle (up to five times a day).
• Arena •
Proceed to a tutorial on the Arena?
Yes
No
